summary: ContactSection.tsx updates appear to implement the provided email/phone/LinkedIn contact methods and the provided X/GitHub/LinkedIn social URLs. However, the diff snippet is truncated before the social link rendering, so itâ€™s not possible to confirm the acceptance criterion about opening in a new tab with `rel="noopener noreferrer"`. Two additional files were modified that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Social links continue to open in a new tab and keep `rel="noopener noreferrer"` for external links.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the socialLinks array values but the rendering portion (where `target`/`rel` would be applied) is truncated, so there is no evidence these attributes are present.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update contact/social links in ContactSection; it did not request changes to project state tracking.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified generated frontend file summary documentation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request updates to repository summary/documentation files.
